title: Evidence Ledger Loss
fault_description: Simulate complete evidence ledger data loss by deleting ledger data files in an isolated test environment. Verifies that recovery from backup/snapshot restores full ledger consistency.
fault_injection_steps: Checkpoint current ledger state and record hash
Delete all ledger data files in the isolated test directory
Verify ledger service reports data unavailable
recovery_steps: Detect ledger loss via integrity check failure
Activate read-only mode to prevent further writes
Replay any ledger entries written after backup timestamp
Verify restored ledger hash matches expected value
verification_steps: Confirm ledger service reports healthy status
Validate end-to-end ledger consistency check passes
Verify all cross-peer ledger hashes are consistent
Confirm no data loss beyond the backup/replay window
Check that read-only mode has been lifted
abort_conditions: Fault injection affects files outside the isolated test directory
Ledger service crashes unexpectedly during recovery
Recovery time exceeds 3x SLO with no progress
